why-we-adopted-a-code-of-conduct.title: Why we adopted a Code of Conduct
why-we-adopted-a-code-of-conduct.description: Our thoughts on why Vancouver meetups and events should adopt a Code of Conduct.
why-we-adopted-a-code-of-conduct.author: kennethormandy

announcing-the-type-walk.title: Announcing the Type Walk, for Vancouver Design Week
announcing-the-type-walk.description: For Vancouver Design Week, we’re happy to announce an off-month special event: Type Walk.
announcing-the-type-walk.author: kennethormandy

our-number-twenty.title: Our number twenty
our-number-twenty.description: For our twentieth meetup, the first under our new name Type Brigade, we’ve been planning something a little unconventional. We now have completely custom event numerals, lettered by Type Brigade’s Assistant Organiser Andrea Husky.
our-number-twenty.author: kennethormandy

the-call-for-speakers-is-open.author: kennethormandy
